name: gridstatus
description: Live California electricity grid data — prices, generation mix, demand, and AI-powered analysis. Explore the power grid through natural conversation.
long_description:
Connect Claude to the California power grid. Three tools work out of the box with live CAISO data: market snapshots, statistical price analysis, and AI-powered explanations that combine grid data with weather. Add a gridstatus.io API key to unlock historical data across all 7 US power markets.

Includes an interactive tutorial — select 'GridStatus Tutorial' from the + menu to get a guided walkthrough of everything.

tools.name: get_market_snapshot
tools.description: Live electricity market conditions: prices, load, generation mix, and grid status

tools.name: is_price_unusual
tools.description: Statistical price analysis against hourly baselines and 7-day rolling stats

tools.name: explain_grid_conditions
tools.description: AI-powered explanation combining grid data and weather to explain current conditions

tools.name: query_grid_history
tools.description: Historical grid data across all 7 US power markets (requires API key)

prompts.name: gridstatus_tutorial
prompts.description: Interactive guided walkthrough of all GridStatus features. Start here!

prompts.name: grid_briefing
prompts.description: Comprehensive California grid briefing — chains all tools automatically

prompts.name: investigate_price
prompts.description: Structured price investigation for a specific ISO

api_key.title: GridStatus API Key
api_key.description: Optional — unlocks historical data across all 7 US power markets. Get a free key at gridstatus.io
